name: Avoid using NSException raise:format: and raise:format:arguments:
description:
False information can be injected by an attacker when raising an exception. you need to be careful that your display routines do not process format strings received from the untrusted source.
The injection could be done in NSException using the methods
raise:format and raise:format:arguments: .
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: An attacker could access other user information thanks to string injection through the format method. This is why you have be very careful when using this API.
alternativeName: Avoid using NSException raise:format: and raise:format:arguments:
